name: The Panspermia Guy
description:
Spread life! The universe needs you!
  • Gather samples of bio material from planets
  • Mix them together to form panspermia seeds
  • Shoot the seeds out into the universe (for points, obviously)

As you shoot more and more seeds, the universe will go from barren to bustling with life.

You will find tools along the way to help you, and maybe there's a mystery to be solved along the way?

It is not everybody that likes life. The scary Spider-Droids will try to stop you, so watch out!

You can use your gamepad or your keyboard to play. It also works on your phone, it has on-screen controls.

Need some guidance? Comment down below, or find your answer in the Complete Manual
